sense.def:
To blame a person or thing
pomeni misliti, da sta tisti človek ali stvar kriva za nekaj slabega.

seg.quote: I was blamed for the theft.
You haven't said a word of blame.

sense.def:
The blame for something bad
je odgovornost, ker smo povzročili ali dovolili, da se je zgodilo nekaj slabega.

seg.quote: He had to take the blame for everything.

sense.def:
Not to blame someone for doing something
pomeni misliti, da je bilo dejanje nekega človeka v danih okoliščinah razumno.

seg.quote: I can't really blame him for wanting to make me suffer.
